awards.text: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 7 wins & 7 nominations.

fullplot: Professional photographer L.B. "Jeff" Jeffries breaks his leg while getting an action shot at an auto race. Confined to his New York apartment, he spends his time looking out of the rear window observing the neighbors. He begins to suspect that a man across the courtyard may have murdered his wife. Jeff enlists the help of his high society fashion-consultant girlfriend Lisa Freemont and his visiting nurse Stella to investigate.
plot: A wheelchair bound photographer spies on his neighbours from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.
title: Rear Window

tomatoes.consensus: Hitchcock exerted full potential of suspense in this masterpiece.

writers: Cornell Woolrich (based on the short story by)
